description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Survive the onslaught of strains with nothing more than rocks at your disposal! 1-4 player co-op and versus, 16 challenges, 4 survivor difficulty modes, 7 unique enemy strains, 26 customizing menu options, random terrain generation, high scores, and 16 music tracks! Play the challenges with your friends or setup a unique experience within the custom skirmish settings.
description.short: Survive the onslaught of strains with nothing more than rocks at your disposal! 1-4 player co-op and versus, 16 challenges, 4 survivor difficulty modes, 7 unique enemy strains, 26 customizing menu options, random terrain generation, high scores, and 16 music tracks! Play the challenges with your friends or setup a unique experience within the custom skirmish settings.
